summary: This is an email from a Department of Justice system forwarding a voice message attachment from a wireless caller to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact address. It indicates a communication attempt related to the Epstein case shortly after his death.

events.title: Voice Message Forwarded to Epstein Victims Contact
events.description: An email from a DOJ system forwards a voice message attachment from a wireless caller to the USANYS.EpsteinVictims email address.

keyFacts: A voice message from a wireless caller was forwarded to the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York's Epstein victims contact email on August 14, 2019.
The communication occurred shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019, suggesting ongoing public or victim outreach to the investigation.
The email originated from a Department of Justice VoIP system, indicating official handling of potential tips or information.
The attachment was a .wav audio file containing the voice message.
The document shows the operational mechanism for receiving communications related to the Epstein case through a dedicated victims email address.
